title: Strengthening Software Development Competencies: English Collaborative Learning for University Students Using Web 2.0 and Padlet

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English communication skills and experience with simple digital tools
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can collaboratively perform English writing tasks using Web 2.0 tools (Padlet).
Learners can provide over 80% of speaking and listening feedback through peer assessment in blended learning environments.
Learners can enhance social presence by over 20% through digital collaborative activities.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
